description.displayText: Lisa is an absolute pleasure to have around family and in the work environment. She is incredibly patient and she will strive to show you how supportive, caring and lovable that she is. Lisa takes her work to the next level, there's a difference between a job, and how passionate you are to put into your career, and Lisa is a prime example of that. If you're looking for someone to be very reliable and trustworthy around your family, then you came across a unique individual that will show you all of that! You will have full confidence in her because of her many years of experience, she is an absolute one of a kind, and you choosing her would be the best decision that you can make for your family/friends, etc.
